sentence: A state senator challenging Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R) in the North Carolina released a new ad on Monday knocking the congressman for his use of Instagram.
author: Mychael Schnell
title: Cawthorn challenger knocks opponent for Instagram use in new ad

sentence: Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.) has accused the establishment? of launching a coordinated drip campaign? against him, a comment that comes as the congressman finds himself in the midst of several controversies.
author: Sarakshi Rai
title: Cawthorn says establishment' is hitting him with coordinated drip campaign'
